sentences.sContent: Do people believe anyone has one and only one measure of attractiveness?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do people believe anyone has one and only one measure of attractiveness?
sentences.sCn: 难道人们真的认为吸引力只有一个衡量的尺度吗？

sentences.sContent: He rates her lower not only on attractiveness, but also on warmth and intelligence.
sentences.sContent_eng: He rates her lower not only on attractiveness, but also on warmth and intelligence.
sentences.sCn: 不仅是其吸引力，对她的热情程度和智力的评价都会降低。

sentences.sContent: And so the attractiveness ratings, as well as the frequency of messaging, are factored in.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so the attractiveness ratings, as well as the frequency of messaging, are factored in.
sentences.sCn: 所以吸引力指数，和传送信息的频率一样，被作为因素植入其中。

phrases.pCn: 外表吸引力；体态吸引力

words.tran: 吸引人的；有魅力的；引人注目的
迷人地；有吸引力地；动人地
吸引，吸引力；引力；吸引人的事物
[自] 吸引子；引起注意的人
